content: with an easy to remember 2 row repeat this crochet washcloth pattern will make a great gift idea - perfect for last minute gifts housewarming gift ideas birthdays teamed with favourite soaps or even baby showers cotton washcloths are ideal for babies because they are great for sensitive skin it works up really quickly and uses around 70 yards of cotton yarn the ebbing tides is an intermediate crochet washcloth pattern as it uses crossed treble crochets to create the effect with basic cabling techniques there are no front post or back post stitches for this one and a full video tutorial is linked in the pattern - difficulty level intermediate this pattern uses in us terms - single crochets double crochets and crossed treble crochets to create the fantastic texture you see here written pattern includes pattern also comes with links to the complete video tutorial for this pattern for both left and right handed crocheters written instructions you can read more about this great crochet washcloth pattern and check out the free version on my blog post at sunflower cottage crochet i hire experienced crochet artisans to test our patterns for accuracy and readability ❤ layout of the pattern my patterns all share the same layout they are easy to read and easy to find important information you need such as materials needed sizing information gauge information and special stitches used as well as how to do them as mentioned above this pattern includes written instructions and video links to both the special stitches and the full pattern tutorial in left and right handed versions ❤ size this washcloth will be around 8-9 square once complete ❤ materials approx 70 yards of 4 weight cotton 5mm hook 4 stitch markers optional scissors tapestry needle don t forget to tag me on your ebbing tides crochet washcloth makes
